title: FS: Jennings One Hand Polar Bear PSA 4

posts.post_title: FS: Jennings One Hand Polar Bear PSA 4
posts.post_content:
Eee-yah! Nice PSA 4 Polar Bear Jennings one hand. Decently centered with small patches of tobacco consistent with Polar Bear cards.

SALE PENDING $170 delivered with PP/FF. (For reference, SMR is $200 for PSA 4)

PM or email [url]samuelswartz@yahoo.com[/url]. 4 successful sales on BST to date.

Hi Sam

I'll take it.

PM coming soon
If Jantz doesn't buy I will.  Great card!
